rules_text:
Whenever Void Crypter deals combat damage to a player, exile that many cards from the top of their library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield.
Morph {4}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)[/i]
notes:
Requested by Nijugo
Big morph in at least one jund color
